html: The political declaration does not create a link between a future agreement on fisheries, including access to waters, and any agreement on trade in fisheries products.

html: The text states explicitly that the UK will be an independent coastal State; UNLCOS gives us rights to manage our UK’s territorial waters (0-12nm) and Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) (12-200nm or the median line with other coastal states).
text: The text states explicitly that the UK will be an independent coastal State; UNLCOS gives us rights to manage our UK’s territorial waters (0-12nm) and Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) (12-200nm or the median line with other coastal states).

html: For the @NicolaSturgeon & others... Some clarity. The red lines have been protected. ''The declaration gives the UK the power to assert its position as an independent Coastal State with full, unfettered sovereignty over our waters and natural resources” - SFFs Bertie Armstrong.

html: The farmer and their household have been advised, are co-operating fully and importantly, are being supported to deal with the situation. Any other farmers with concerns should seek immediate veterinary advice
text: The farmer and their household have been advised, are co-operating fully and importantly, are being supported to deal with the situation. Any other farmers with concerns should seek immediate veterinary advice

html: We have activated plans to protect food safety and our valuable farming industry. These include precautionary movement restrictions at the farm, while further investigations are undertaken to identify the origin of the disease.
text: We have activated plans to protect food safety and our valuable farming industry. These include precautionary movement restrictions at the farm, while further investigations are undertaken to identify the origin of the disease.

html: Consumers can be reassured that these important protection measures remain in place. No meat from the affected animal has entered the food chain. A confirmed case of Classical BSE does not represent a threat to human health.
text: Consumers can be reassured that these important protection measures remain in place. No meat from the affected animal has entered the food chain. A confirmed case of Classical BSE does not represent a threat to human health.

html: There is no risk to consumer health as high levels of consumer protection are already in place. These include controls on animal feed, and removal of the parts of cattle most likely to carry BSE infectivity.
text: There is no risk to consumer health as high levels of consumer protection are already in place. These include controls on animal feed, and removal of the parts of cattle most likely to carry BSE infectivity.

html: Disappointing to have a confirmed case of BSE in Aberdeenshire. Scotland’s Chief Veterinary Officer is leading co-ordination of activity with her animal health & welfare team & other agencies & is liaising closely with other CVOs across the UK-Defra are also being kept appraised
